title: How to decrease idle CPU usage - Quora

response.answer_text: Assuming this is a serious question. The answer is simple. To decrease CPU idle time, increase the amount of time other processes use. You could raise the priority of other processes, or run multiple jobs at the same time. Try running your virus scanner and defragmenter your disk at the same time. Crank up the priority of the virus scanner. That should drastically decrease your idle CPU usage.
To decrease idle CPU usage, you need to start more processor intensive processes. After all, if the CPU is idle, it means it has nothing to do, so give it something to do.
